name: accessibility-js-routines
description: A library with commonly used accessibility routines.
author: Zoltan Hawryluk

scripts.build:all: npm run build; npm run build:prod
scripts.update:patch: V=`npm version patch`; git push origin $V; npm publish
scripts.update:minor: V=`npm version minor`; git push origin $V; npm publish
scripts.update:major: V=`npm version major`; git push origin $V; npm publish
